amendment.description: Amendment sought to clarify the congressional procedure for acting on a written request for a waiver by the President by requiring that Congress act within 7 days from the time such a waiver is received.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to clarify the procedure for considering a request for a congressional waiver by the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 234 (Roll no. 524).
